page.title: 14THE BIN
page.content:
The Bin is not the highest hill in Cairnie but it is the most prominent feature. There are quite a number of legends attached to it.
A large stone near the top of The Bin is known as Samsons Putting Stone. Samson was supposed to have stood on top of The Bin and tossed the stone to Goliath of Gath who was standing on Drumdelgie Hill, a mile away.
There is a large cave on top of The Bin which is supposed to have been the home of witches. There is supposed to be an underground road from this cave to Dunbennan Hill about two miles distant.
